Header: 101 Army Soldiers Give Blood to Patients in Jaffna Hospital
Content: To coincide with the 24th anniversary celebration of the 52 Division of the Security Force Headquarters-Jaffna, troops serving all formations under the 52 Division donated their blood on Thursday (15) under the guidance of Brigadier Sena Waduge, General Officer Commanding 52 Division. A total of 101 Army personnel volunteered to give blood to the medical staff who had arrived there from the Jaffna Teaching Hospital during the programme at the 52 Division Headquarters.
